author: undetermined
full_text:
IAF to conduct Aerial Display in Mumbai from 12 to 14 January 2024

Mumbai, 9 January 2024

The Indian Air Force will organize an aerial display in Mumbai as part of the Indian Air Force outreach programme in coordination with the Government of Maharashtra from 12 Jan to 14 Jan 24 between 12pm to 1pm over Marine Drive. The outreach programme is primarily aimed at creating awareness and fostering a deeper connection between the Indian Air Force and the local community. The captivating displays and demonstrations, will showcase the skills, capabilities and professionalism of the IAF.

The event will comprise of aerobatic displays by the Suryakiran Aerobatic Display Team (SKAT) and the 'Sarang' Helicopter display team. This event would also feature a diverse range of aerial activities, including a flypast and low-level aerobatic display by the Su-30 MKI, freefall and parachute displays by the 'Akashganga' team and C-130 aircraft.

PIB Mumbai | NJ/ DR

(Release ID: 1994527)
title: Fact: The Indian Air Force will organize an aerial display in Mumbai as part of the Indian Air Force outreach programme in coordination with the Government of Maharashtra from 12 Jan to 14 Jan 24 between 12pm to 1pm over Marine Drive, according to a PIB release.
vclaim: The Indian Air Force will conduct aerial displays over Marine Drive in Mumbai from January 12-14, 2024, between 12pm to 1pm. The event will feature performances by the Suryakiran Aerobatic Display Team, Sarang Helicopter team, Su-30 MKI aircraft, and Akashganga parachute team.
